text: 12.9: 2 Ko 11.30; Fi 4.11-13; 1 Pi 4.14Ana khaŋ na nzuai, “Gu fhura korar mbui korar muumbar, ana za ndun tugɨratɨgi. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, guma kaŋgi, ana ŋkasŋka ki fhu, nan ŋkasŋka khaŋ tɨgap havhargiap guigira anan hi.” Guma Bakɨme maaŋ nzuaim, gu maaŋ muuŋgiap, ntigem gu ŋkasŋka ki fhuv, gu guigira ndikndigirga. Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, gu ŋkasŋka ki fhu, Kraisan ŋkasŋka nan kɨrga.
